|image         = Talent Stellar Restoration.png
|character     = Keqing
|type          = Elemental Skill
|info          = Hurls a Lightning Stiletto that annihilates her opponents like the swift thunder.<br />When the Stiletto hits its target, it deals {{Color|Electro DMG}} to opponents in a small [[AoE]], and places a Stiletto Mark on the spot hit.<br /><br />'''Hold'''<br />Hold to adjust the direction in which the Stiletto shall be thrown.<br />Stilettos thrown by the Hold attack mode can be suspended in mid-air, allowing Keqing to jump to them when using Stellar Restoration a second time.<br /><br />'''Lightning Stiletto'''<br />If Keqing uses Stellar Restoration again or uses a Charged Attack while its duration lasts, it will clear the Stiletto Mark and produce different effects:<br />
*If she uses Stellar Restoration again, she will blink to the location of the Mark and unleash one slashing attack that deals {{Color|AoE Electro DMG}}. When blinking to a Stiletto that was thrown from a Holding attack, Keqing can leap across obstructing terrain.
*If Keqing uses a Charged Attack, she will ignite a series of thundering cuts at the Mark's location, dealing {{Color|AoE Electro DMG}}.
|energyGen     = When hit a least one enemy with the 2nd activation (from the 2nd use or with charged attack), generates 2.5 elemental particles.

{{Description|"Humans are like moths, endlessly chasing the flame we call [[Archons|gods]] and [[adepti]]. But this light that I have here is my own."}}
'''Stellar Restoration''' is [[Keqing]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{TalentNote|cooldown|immediate}}
* {{TalentNote|particles|Slashing DMG or Thunderclap Slash DMG|2.5}}
* The Stiletto's duration is 5 seconds.
